thread.title: Chevrolet of Naperville features many 2016 models
thread.title_full: Chevrolet of Naperville features many 2016 models

author: admin
title: Chevrolet of Naperville features many 2016 models
text:
Companies mentioned in this article: Chevrolet of Naperville 
NAPERVILLE, Ill., Sept. 30, 2015 /PRNewswire-iReach/ -- Of the 15 commonly purchased passenger vehicles carried at Chevrolet of Naperville, a little over half of the 2016 models of those have been delivered. The rest will be arriving in the next few weeks and through the first quarter of next year. In the mean time, the dealership invites customers to its showroom to see what is available right now, which includes a pair of sedans, a midsize pickup truck and SUVs of every size and level of capability that the automaker has to offer. Chevrolet of Naperville has used its blog to make a single location where potential buyers can find information about each new 2016 Chevy vehicle that is available at the dealership. 
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20150930/272467 
Starting off the available 2016 vehicles at Chevrolet of Naperville are the 2016 Chevy Cruze and 2016 Chevy Malibu. Both vehicles have been heavily redesigned for the new model-year. Chevy engineer have managed to shed several hundred pounds from the overall weight of each sedan while, at the same time, making the passenger cabins larger for greater passenger comfort. 
Also available, is the previous year's Motor Trend "Truck of the Year" the 2016 Chevy Colorado. The midsize pickup truck can be outfitted with a four-cylinder or V-6 engine. Later in the production cycle, a powerful and efficient diesel engine will be available. Customers looking for a nimble and technologically advanced way to get through crowded urban streets can look at the 2016 Chevy Trax. A member of the new subcompact crossover SUV class, the interior of the new Trax is highly adaptable and can carry a surprising amount of cargo. 
Crossover SUVs are always among the most popular vehicles at Chevrolet of Naperville. The 2016 Chevy Equinox and 2016 Chevy Traverse are both on the ground and for sale in the dealership's showroom. Customers will notice that the new Equinox has a few new exterior elements and a brand new grille design. Some of the new additions to the 2016 Traverse include the 4G LTE Wi-Fi hotspot to help people stay connected to one another while on the move. 
Finally the 2016 Chevy Suburban and 2016 Chevy Tahoe have arrived to Chevrolet of Naperville. Both capable SUVs have the same cavernous amount of cargo space and incredible towing capacity as before. New for the 2016 model-year is the ability to use the Apple CarPlay suite of applications to enhance integration with the new Chevy MyLink system. 
Anyone can view the Chevrolet of Naperville inventory by visiting the dealership's website, www.chevroletofnaperville.com . The showroom is located at 1515 West Ogden Avenue, Naperville, IL 60540. Customers with questions about the any of the new 2016 Chevy models available at Chevrolet of Naperville can contact a sales professional today by calling 855-315-0245. 
Media Contact: Tom Gregg, Chevrolet of Naperville, 855-315-0245, tgregg@napervilletoyota.com 
News distributed by PR Newswire iReach: https://ireach.prnewswire.com 
SOURCE Chevrolet of Naperville
